video_prompt: A dark, reflective robot slowly lifts its bowed head, its gaze shifting upwards with a contemplative expression. Electric blue circuitry within its transparent sections pulsates and flows, while its delicate fingers subtly unfurl and gesture. Behind, a white robot's head subtly turns, its eyes tracking a movement. The futuristic, cool-toned background subtly alters, with glowing lines softly pulsing and geometric shapes reconfiguring.
image_prompt:
Here's a concise prompt:

"Vertical image of two advanced humanoid robots. Foreground: a sleek, highly reflective black female robot, gleaming polished metal with luminous electric blue circuitry and internal mechanisms visible through transparent panels on its neck, arm, and articulated fingers. Head bowed, gazing downwards contemplatively. Behind and to the right, a slightly blurred matte white female robot observes. Set in a clean, abstract futuristic high-tech laboratory with out-of-focus geometric architecture and subtle glowing lines. Cool blue and white ambient lighting with vibrant electric blue accents. Precise lighting, strong specular highlights, shallow depth of field, high contrast, monochromatic palette, high-tech aesthetic, sophisticated, AI."
refined_video_prompt: A dark robot's head slowly lifts, its gaze shifting upwards with a contemplative expression. Electric blue circuitry pulsates and flows within its transparent sections, as delicate fingers subtly unfurl and gesture. Behind, a white robot's head subtly turns, its eyes tracking movement. The futuristic background alters, with glowing lines softly pulsing and geometric shapes reconfiguring.
